## Description {#details}

Represents dependencies between instructions.

This class is a wrapper of <code>SUnits</code> and its dependencies to manipulate back-edges in a natural way. Currently it only supports back-edges via PHI, which are expressed as anti-dependencies in the original DAG. FIXME: Support any other loop-carried dependencies

Definition at line 198 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>.
